statements: SELECT * FROM remote_work_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, start_date FROM remote_work_schedule WHERE remote_location = 'New York';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM remote_work_schedule WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM remote_work_schedule WHERE end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, remote_location FROM remote_work_schedule WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT DISTINCT remote_location FROM remote_work_schedule;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS avg_duration FROM remote_work_schedule;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS num_occurrences FROM remote_work_schedule GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT MAX(end_date) AS latest_end_date FROM remote_work_schedule;
SELECT MIN(start_date) AS earliest_start_date FROM remote_work_schedule WHERE remote_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT employee_id, remote_location, start_date, end_date FROM remote_work_schedule WHERE remote_location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT employee_id, remote_location, end_date FROM remote_work_schedule ORDER BY end_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS num_remote FROM remote_work_schedule WHERE remote_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_id, start_date FROM remote_work_schedule WHERE YEAR(start_date) = 2022;
SELECT employee_id, remote_location FROM remote_work_schedule WHERE MONTH(start_date) = 6;
SELECT employee_id, remote_location, start_date, end_date FROM remote_work_schedule WHERE remote_location IN ('New York', 'San Francisco');
SELECT * FROM remote_work_schedule WHERE employee_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS avg_duration FROM remote_work_schedule GROUP BY remote_location;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT employee_id) AS num_employees FROM remote_work_schedule;
SELECT employee_id, remote_location, start_date, end_date FROM remote_work_schedule WHERE remote_location = 'Chicago' OR remote_location = 'Atlanta';
SELECT * FROM remote_teams;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM remote_teams;
SELECT * FROM remote_employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, role FROM remote_employees;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM remote_employees WHERE team_id=1;
SELECT team_name, team_leader FROM remote_teams WHERE team_id=2;
SELECT team_name, team_leader, employee_name FROM remote_teams INNER JOIN remote_employees ON remote_teams.team_id = remote_employees.team_id;
SELECT team_name, team_leader, employee_name FROM remote_teams LEFT JOIN remote_employees ON remote_teams.team_id = remote_employees.team_id;
SELECT team_name, team_leader, employee_name FROM remote_teams RIGHT JOIN remote_employees ON remote_teams.team_id = remote_employees.team_id;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS employee_count FROM remote_teams LEFT JOIN remote_employees ON remote_teams.team_id = remote_employees.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, team_leader, COUNT(employee_id) AS employee_count FROM remote_teams LEFT JOIN remote_employees ON remote_teams.team_id = remote_employees.team_id GROUP BY team_name, team_leader;
SELECT team_name, MAX(employee_id) AS max_employee_id FROM remote_teams LEFT JOIN remote_employees ON remote_teams.team_id = remote_employees.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, MIN(employee_id) AS min_employee_id FROM remote_teams LEFT JOIN remote_employees ON remote_teams.team_id = remote_employees.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, AVG(employee_id) AS avg_employee_id FROM remote_teams LEFT JOIN remote_employees ON remote_teams.team_id = remote_employees.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, SUM(employee_id) AS total_employee_id FROM remote_teams LEFT JOIN remote_employees ON remote_teams.team_id = remote_employees.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, team_leader, employee_name FROM remote_teams UNION SELECT team_name, team_leader, employee_name FROM remote_teams;
SELECT team_name, team_leader, employee_name FROM remote_teams INTERSECT SELECT team_name, team_leader, employee_name FROM remote_teams;
SELECT team_name, team_leader, employee_name FROM remote_teams EXCEPT SELECT team_name, team_leader, employee_name FROM remote_teams;
SELECT team_name, team_leader, employee_name FROM remote_teams ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, team_leader, employee_name FROM remote_teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM remote_teams;
SELECT team_name FROM remote_teams;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM remote_teams;
SELECT * FROM remote_employees;
SELECT employee_name FROM remote_employees;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM remote_employees;
SELECT * FROM remote_tasks;
SELECT task_name FROM remote_tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM remote_tasks;
SELECT team_name, employee_name FROM remote_teams JOIN remote_employees ON remote_teams.team_id = remote_employees.team_id;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, employee_name, role FROM remote_teams JOIN remote_employees ON remote_teams.team_id = remote_employees.team_id;
SELECT employee_name, role, task_name FROM remote_employees JOIN remote_tasks ON remote_employees.employee_id = remote_tasks.employee_id;
SELECT team_name, task_name FROM remote_teams JOIN remote_employees ON remote_teams.team_id = remote_employees.team_id JOIN remote_tasks ON remote_employees.employee_id = remote_tasks.employee_id;

SELECT team_name, employee_name, task_name FROM remote_teams JOIN remote_employees ON remote_teams.team_id = remote_employees.team_id JOIN remote_tasks ON remote_employees.employee_id = remote_tasks.employee_id;

SELECT team_name, team_lead, task_name, deadline FROM remote_teams JOIN remote_employees ON remote_teams.team_id = remote_employees.team_id JOIN remote_tasks ON remote_employees.employee_id = remote_tasks.employee_id;

SELECT team_name, employee_name, role, task_name, deadline FROM remote_teams JOIN remote_employees ON remote_teams.team_id = remote_employees.team_id JOIN remote_tasks ON remote_employees.employee_id = remote_tasks.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM remote_teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM remote_employees WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM remote_tasks WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM remote_employees WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT * FROM remote_tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-12-31';

SELECT task_name FROM tasks WHERE assignee = '345678'

SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY project_name ASC
SELECT * FROM tasks ORDER BY status DESC
